text: Boglar Shamans are often gifted Moor Hounds by the Fimir. It can be considered a form of reward or punishment. If the Hound devours the Shaman, it was a punishment. If the Shaman tames the hound, it was a reward.
The highest ranking Nobles often ride into battle on a mighty Bog Beast.

Whether it's the genuine article or a replica made for her is unknown, but Skattach claims this is the original throne of the mythical Hellmother, ruler of all Fimir. Carrying her throne are 4 of Skattach's most trusted Fianna Finmor.
